message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. This is a great deal, considering its value to me is no less than $12000. I think you'll love it, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.

I'm interested in the product, but I was hoping we could come to a better agreement on the price. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it. I think that's a fair price considering the value I can get from it.

I understand your concerns about the price, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13500. This is still a great deal, considering its value to me is no less than $12000. I think it's a fair compromise and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
